img_above_text:
![Wukong Sandgate 32.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/11/Wukong_Sandgate_32.jpg)
Putting the large door to the right on pause for a moment, turn your attention to the large valley in the opposite direction where the second Rat Captain patrols. The ridge above is crawling with multiple Rat Archers, plus another Rat Archer on the rooftop to the left will make trying to take him on a pain.
img_below_text:
Instead, use Cloud Step to race past, and climb the hill to take out the archers and avoid the Soldier.
![Wukong Sandgate 35X.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b3/Wukong_Sandgate_35X.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 30 from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Sandgate 32.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/11/Wukong_Sandgate_32.jpg)
Putting the large door to the right on pause for a moment, turn your attention to the large valley in the opposite direction where the second Rat Captain patrols. The ridge above is crawling with multiple Rat Archers, plus another Rat Archer on the rooftop to the left will make trying to take him on a pain."
            - Following Text: "Instead, use Cloud Step to race past, and climb the hill to take out the archers and avoid the Soldier.
![Wukong Sandgate 35X.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b3/Wukong_Sandgate_35X.jpg)"

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing the protagonist using a special ability, likely "Cloud Step," to quickly move through a rugged, valley-like terrain. The context suggests that this maneuver is part of a strategy to bypass enemies, specifically Rat Archers and a Rat Captain, by swiftly climbing a hill to eliminate the archers and avoid direct confrontation with a Soldier.
